' called onBeforeGet ' must be used in conjunction with method "Show Document Grid Icons" ' 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
Dim thisItem As XmlElement = Me.dom.SelectSingleNode("//Item") Dim selectStr As String = thisItem.GetAttribute("select")
If Not (selectStr.Equals("*") Or selectStr.Equals("")) Then If selectStr.indexOf("has_files ") < 0 Or selectStr.indexOf("has_files,") < 0 Then selectStr = selectStr & ",has_files"
thisItem.SetAttribute("select", selectStr) End If
